content: A small sneak preview of the first post I'm working on for my refreshed websiteüëá

photo.alt: Screenshot of two windows from my laptop. The first is of a Chrome window on the left third of the screen with the IndieWeb Principles page open and the other two third of the screen is taken up by my writing app where I'm writing my first post for my website. Only the title (Why you need a personal website) and the status (draft) are visible as the rest is blurred out
